text: The XG9 Lance is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Ram Tah, produced from 3304 to the present. It is a versatile all-rounder with Guardian weaponry, slightly slower than the F63 Condor and less maneuverable than the Gu-97, but with substantial damage output, especially against Thargoid craft.
The XG9 Lance has dimensions of 15.3m x 12.2m x 11.2m, armor rating of 10, shields of 30 MJ, top speed of 316 m/s, boost speed of 541 m/s, and 3 weapon mounts.

The Gauss Focus Cannon on the XG9 Lance is a projectile weapon with the second highest damage-per-shot (94) of all three Guardian hybrid fighters. It has a moderate rate-of-fire, very high armor piercing, but limited ammo and high heat generation.
